reviewtext: Have used the Fine Pix for 8-months now.My PERSONAL experience with it:Pluses: Reliable, easy to operate, nice combination of features, small and handy (but see below), battery life: ok for about 25-35 pictures.Minuses: Have to work hard to get sharp pictures - usually I do not succeed; not really  a 'pocket' camera; red-eye reduction never worked with my kids.Overall: If you can get it for $300 it is a good deal, current price of $500+ seems too expansive for what you get.
